description:
Built on science, Sleep Cycle uses sound analysis to track and improve sleep for over 3 million users worldwide. Our sleep tracker and Smart Alarm clock app help you to identify potential sleep issues, gain valuable insights into your sleep patterns and build a healthier sleep routine.

Sleep Cycle is the world’s no.1 sleep app with more than 40 million downloads. Track your rest, wake refreshed, and build lifelong sleep habits.

AWARDS & RECOGNITIONS
Sleep Cycle has been awarded Best Sleep App in 2024 by Digital Health Magazine and featured as App of the Month in Wellness Today. In 2024, Sleep Cycle won two Merit Healthcare Awards: Gold for Mobile Digital Health Resources and Silver for Best Use of Artificial Intelligence.

WITH SLEEP CYCLE YOU CAN
• Wake up gently during your lightest sleep phase with our Smart Alarm clock.
• Track every night using patented sound technology or accelerometer-based sleep detection, no wearables needed.
• Detect nighttime noises like snoring, coughing, or sleep talking, for a path to quieter sleep.
• Drift off easily using our sleep sounds library of relaxing stories, sleepy soundscapes and guided meditations.
• Understand your sleep patterns with long-term trends and compare your sleep to global benchmarks.
• Log sleep notes to understand how caffeine, stress, or exercise affect your rest.

WHY USE SLEEP CYCLE?
• Wake feeling refreshed with no more groggy mornings.
• Get daily stats to help you understand your rest.
• Health insights with snoring and cough tracking for wellness.
• No gadgets, just place your phone on the nightstand.
• Premium tools like supportive soundscapes, sleep stories, data export, Philips HUE sunrise and Apple Health sync.

ABOUT SLEEP CYCLE
Sleep Cycle helps you sleep smarter. Track your nights, gain valuable insights into your sleep patterns, and wake at just the right time to start the day energized. Sleep Cycle gives you science-backed tools to help you improve your sleep for brighter days.

Our popular features include:
• Superior sleep tracker.
• Smart Alarm clock.
• Sleep talking recorder.
• Advanced sleep analysis.
• Snore tracker.
• Sleep timer. 
• Cough recorder.
• Sleep stages.
• Sleep programs.
• SleepGPT.
• Sleep goal and score.
• Relaxing sleep sounds like nature, rain and ocean sounds.
• Sleep Aid including calming meditations and breathing exercises.
• And more features to help you improve your rest.

TALK TO US
If you need any help please contact our customer service at support.sleepcycle.com
 
JOIN THE COMMUNITY
 ▶ Web: https://sleepcycle.com/
 ▶ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sleepcycleapp/
 ▶ TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@sleep_cycle
 ▶ Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/sleepcycle/

Terms & Privacy
https://www.sleepcycle.com/privacy-policy/ 

DOWNLOAD NOW – Sleep Better with Sleep Cycle

We created Welmi App to help you reach your weight goals in the most comfortable way possible — no stressful fasting, extreme diets, or exhausting workouts, but gently forming conscious food habits and adjusting your nutrition.
Our mission is to be a personal nutritionist for everyone — not just a calorie counter, but a true companion to help you achieve your dream shape and maintain healthy eating habits.

Snap your meals, and we’ll gently guide you toward your fitness goals!

App features we crafted for you:
– Food & calorie scanner
Simply snap a photo of your meal, and the app will instantly log all its details.

– Personalized nutrition recommendations
Optimize your diet to feel more energetic. Discover your ideal meal sizes, food types, and the best eating schedule.

– Eating reminders
We’ll notify you when it’s the right time for a healthy meal.

– Macronutrient counter
Track your carbs, proteins, and fats with just a picture of your food.

– Daily streaks
Challenge yourself to eat healthy every day and beat your personal record!

*Analysis results require a subscription

Your healthy companions,
Welmi Team

If you have any ideas or questions, please email us at welmiappai@gmail.com

Note: We do not offer medical advice. Any and all recommendations should be viewed as suggestions, please consult with a professional and do your own research before trying a new calorie and nutrient plan.

Terms: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Strava makes fitness tracking social. We house your entire active journey in one spot – and you get to share it with friends. Here’s how:

• Record everything – runs, rides, hikes, yoga and over 30 other sport types. Think of Strava as the home of your movement.

• Discover anywhere – our Routes tool uses de-identified Strava data to intelligently recommend popular routes based on your preferences. You can also build your own.

• Build a support network – Strava’s about celebrating movement. Here you’ll find your community and cheer each other on.

• Train smarter – get data insights to understand your progress and see how you improve. Your Training Log is the record of all your workouts.

• Get more from your workout – Powered by AI, Athlete Intelligence turns workout data into into instant insights. Keeping you motivated and ready for the next workout – without the guesswork.

• Move safer – share your real-time location with loved ones while outdoors for an extra layer of safety.

• Sync your favourite apps and devices – Strava is compatible with thousands of them (Apple Watch, Fitbit, Garmin – you name it).

• Join and create challenges – join millions in monthly challenges to chase new goals, collect digital badges and stay accountable.

• Embrace the unfiltered – your feed on Strava is filled with real efforts from real people. That’s how we motivate each other.

• Whether you’re a world-class athlete or a total beginner, you belong here. Just record and go.

Strava includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.
Strava uses HealthKit to export your Strava activities into the Health app and to read heart rate and biometric data.

You can subscribe and pay on the App Store, using your Apple ID. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renew may be turned off after purchase by going to the ‘Manage Subscription’ page in settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

Terms of Service: https://www.strava.com/legal/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.strava.com/legal/privacy

Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.

Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.

With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.

With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts

New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.

Start tracking your cycle for free today.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://flo.health/privacy-policy  
https://flo.health/terms-of-use 

Connect with Flo:
Web: flo.health
TikTok: @flotracker
Instagram: @flotracker

Please note: Flo is not a diagnostic tool and should not be used as a method of contraception or to facilitate conception. Predictions and insights provided by the app are intended for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or decisions.

Flo uses HealthKit to read menstrual cycle data and export your Flo activities to the Health app.

If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.

Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.

Get the fitness, sports, and health results you want with the Technogym app and Technogym Coach.

Whether you train at the gym, at home, or on the go, enjoy access to an on-demand library of 1,000+ workouts, personalized workout programs, classes, the Wellness Magazine, individual and community challenges, and more to stay on track with your goals and boost your performance. 


GET A PERSONALIZED PRECISION PROGRAM 

The AI-powered Technogym Coach gives you guidance and encouragement, whether you want to start working out, get stronger, tone up, play your favorite sport better, improve your athletic performance, or simply live a longer and healthier life. 

Just tell Technogym Coach what your goals are, how much time you want to work out, and what equipment you have on hand, and you’ll get a personalized Precision Program you can adjust any time based on your location, equipment, needs, and progress.


ACCESS 1000+ ON-DEMAND WORKOUTS

A huge on-demand workout library – including HIIT, yoga, Pilates, strength training, mindfulness and stretching, and more – is just a swipe away with new workouts added each week.

Browse workouts for any goal, muscle group, and level, whether you want self-guided exercises, to work out on equipment with instructor-led classes, do bodyweight workouts at home, or train outdoors. 


CREATE YOUR OWN WORKOUTS 

Decide your own training journey with the workout builder feature, whether your focus is on weightlifting, cardio, or bodyweight exercises. Create, save, and edit your own workouts for specific days, training needs, and goals, and track your progress over time. 


GET WELLNESS TIPS & NEWS

Stay up to date on the latest news and tips in the world of training, lifestyle, nutrition, and mindfulness with the Wellness Magazine.


TEST YOURSELF WITH CHALLENGES

A bit of healthy competition is a great way to test your limits and stay motivated. Join our challenges across a wide range of activities and sports and collect badges to show off.


MONITOR YOUR PROGRESS

The Technogym app is compatible with major third-party tracking devices and apps and heart rate monitors as well as Apple Health and Apple Watch so you can track your activities, health numbers and stats, and know where you are in your training journey. 

You can also monitor your health information in your personal Wellness Passport area of the app; collect MOVEs (units that measure how active you are); and check your MOVERGY level (your two-week MOVEs average).

Read our Terms of Use at https://cdnmedia.mywellness.com/privacy/v2/en/conditions.html and our Privacy Policy at https://cdnmedia.mywellness.com/privacy/v2/en/privacy.html

The Garmin Connect™ app is your one-stop source for health and fitness data. Whether you’re training for a race, keeping active or just staying on top of your health, Garmin Connect provides the information and inspiration you need to reach your goals. 
 
Once you pair your phone(1)with a Forerunner®, Venu®, fēnix® or another compatible Garmin device(2), you can review your tracked activities and health metrics. Plus, you can create workouts, build courses and challenge your friends on the leaderboard. 
 
With Garmin Connect you can: 
 
- Personalize your home screen, so the most helpful information is instantly visible 
- Analyze your activities with detailed statistics(3)
- Create customized workouts and courses 
- Review trends in health metrics like heart rate and steps 
- Earn badges for accomplishments 
- Sync with other apps like Apple Health, MyFitnessPal and Strava 
- Get support for Garmin devices and their features 
 
Learn more about Garmin devices and how they work with the Garmin Connect app at Garmin.com. 
 
(1) See compatibility requirements at Garmin.com/BLE 
(2) See a full list of compatible devices at Garmin.com/devices
(3) See Garmin.com/ataccuracy  
 
Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

• Rated 4.6 stars based on 300,000+ reviews
• Trusted by 100M+ people
• App of the Day in the App Store
Track calories, eat better and reach your goals with Yazio’s free calorie counter app.
Whether you're working towards a calorie deficit, want to track your meals or just need a smart food tracker, Yazio is your all-in-one solution. Designed to support sustainable weight loss, muscle gain or weight maintenance, Yazio offers a science-backed approach to calorie counting that delivers long-term success without extreme diets.
• Easy-to-use calorie counter and food tracker

• Huge database with 95% of all food items

Calorie counter
• Free and intuitive calorie tracker

Healthy habits & intermittent fasting

• App help: http://help.yazio.com

Unlock the ultimate food tracker, calorie counter and healthy eating experience with Yazio!
Help us make the Yazio Calorie Counter App even better as your go-to calorie counter, food tracker and weight loss tool. Have ideas or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you!

Track progress toward your nutrition, water, fitness, and weight loss goals with MyFitnessPal. This all-in-one food tracker and health app is like having a nutrition coach, meal planner, and food diary with you at all times.

MyFitnessPal isn’t another restrictive diet app. This is a health app to help you learn about your habits … see how you eat … make smarter food choices … find motivation & support ... and conquer your health goals.

Download and start your free 30-day Premium trial to access exclusive food tracking, fitness logging tools, and expert guidance. You’ll soon discover why MyFitnessPal is the #1 food and nutrition tracker in the U.S., a GQ 2020 Fitness Awards “Best Fitness App,” and has been featured in the New York Times, Wall Street Journal, the Today Show, and U.S. News & World Report.

SO MUCH MORE THAN A CALORIE TRACKER & FOOD JOURNAL

It’s like having a dietitian, personal trainer, and nutrition coach at your fingertips.

Log Food – Easy-to-use tools make food tracking quick and simple
Record Activity – Add workouts and steps with the fitness tracker
Customize Your Goals – Weight loss, weight gain, weight maintenance, nutrition & fitness
See Your Progress – Track at a glance, or analyze nutrition & calories in detail
Learn From a Registered Dietitian – Meal Plans customized for your target calories, whether you want to lose or gain weight—with access to our Meal Planner tool
Stay Inspired – 500+ healthy goal-focused recipes and 50 workouts keep routines fresh and fun
Connect With Community – Find friends and motivation in our active forums

A CLOSER LOOK AT FEATURES & BENEFITS

Gain Valuable Insights Through Food Logging

Discover which foods fuel you best. It’s not just a diet app, calorie counter to lose weight, or a faster way to fat loss—it’s about holding yourself accountable and understanding what you put in your body.

One of the Largest Food Databases – Track calories in over 14 million foods (including restaurant dishes)
Fast & Easy Food Tracker Tools – Type to search, add foods from your history, or quick-add calories
Bar Code & Meal Scan: Log store-bought foods and entire meals using your phone’s camera
Calorie Tracker – Automatically count calories and see your daily progress
Macro Tracker – See carbs, fat & protein breakdown by gram or percentage—no need for a separate carb tracker or keto diet app!
Nutrition Tracker and Insights – Analyze nutrition intake and set specific goals for macros, cholesterol, sodium, fiber & more
Water Logging – Easily keep track of your water intake. 

Customize Your App Experience

Choose settings that help you achieve your goals.

Custom Goals – Track calories by meal or day, set up macro goals & more
Personalized Dashboards – Pick stats you want to see at a glance
Net Carbs Mode/Carb Tracker – To simplify a low carb or keto diet, view net (not total) carbs
Protein Counter – Set your protein goals and track how much you eat during the day
Add Your Own Foods/Meal Tracker – Save recipes and meals for quick logging
Connect 50+ Apps & Devices – From fitness tracker and smartwatch apps, including the Health app
Track With Apple Watch – A calorie tracker, water tracker, and macro tracker on your watch face.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS

MyFitnessPal is free to download and use. If you upgrade to MyFitnessPal Premium, we offer monthly & annual auto-renewing subscriptions.

Payment is charged to your credit card through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless you turn off auto-renewal in iTunes Account Settings after purchase, or cancel your subscription at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period.

View our full terms & conditions and privacy policy: https://www.myfitnesspal.com/privacy-and-terms

Looking for a simple and reliable way to track your heart health and overall well-being? The PulseMate App helps you monitor your heart rate, track blood pressure trends, record blood sugar levels, log vital health data and get personalized healthy suggestions—all in one place, right from your iPhone.

Key features：
Heart rate measurement: Just place your finger lightly on the camera area of   your phone to measure your heart rate.

Blood sugar, blood pressure and temperature records: Conveniently record daily blood pressure, blood sugar and temperature data, PulseMate will generate detailed trend charts for you to help you track health changes.

AI Care: Talk to your dedicated AI health consultants anytime, anywhere. Personalized suggestions can help you make better daily health choices.

HRV analysis: Evaluate your overall health status by monitoring key indicators such as stress, energy and tension.

Drinking water record and reminder: Remind and record daily water intake to help you maintain adequate hydration.

Breathing exercise: Through scientific breathing exercises, it helps you relax, relieve stress and reduce anxiety.

Mental health test: Regularly evaluate mental health status to help you pay attention to your emotions and mental state in time.

Heart health risk test: Through a simple questionnaire, you can gain an in-depth understanding of your heart health status and provide personalized health suggestions.

Health data overview: Centrally view all daily health indicators, manage your health data in one stop, and easily grasp health trends.

How to measure heart rate：
Place your finger lightly on the iPhone's camera lens.
Maintain full coverage of the lens with your fingertip.
Hold steady throughout the duration of the measurement until completion.

Important reminder: 
This application is for personal monitoring and information reference only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice or treatment. If you feel any discomfort or other emergency, please seek medical assistance from a professional medical person immediately.

Subscription Conditions:
- Subscribe to get unlimited access to all premium features.
- Subscription length: weekly, yearly.
- The iTunes account will be charged after the trial period ends.
- You should be aware that the subscription will automatically renew unless you close the automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- After purchase, you can turn off automatic renewal at the account settings.

Privacy Policy:https://greatvitawellness.com/privacy.html 
Terms of Service：https://greatvitawellness.com/terms.html

#walk15 is a free walking app available globally in 25 different languages. The app allows you to count your daily steps, create and participate in steps challenges, discover walking routes, get benefits and discounts for walking, grow virtual trees, and save CO2.

Statistic shows, that after downloading the app and joining the #walk15 walking community, the daily number of your steps increase by at least 30%!

#walk15 app is designed as a free motivational tool and offers users these types of functionalities:
• Pedometer. Allows you to track the number of steps – both daily and weekly. Also, you can set the steps goal that you seek to achieve every day.
• Steps challenges. You can participate in a public steps challenge, stay active and win special prizes. Also, you can create or participate in private steps challenges with your company, family, or friends.
• Steps wallet. Get benefits for staying active and sustainable! In the #walk15 steps wallet, you can exchange your steps for sustainable and healthy goods or discounts.
• Tracks and walking routes. If you need more inspiration to walk, the walking app offers you a number of various cognitive tracks and routes to discover. Each track has its points of interest supplemented with photos, an audio guide, augmented reality features, and text descriptions.
• Educational messages. While walking you will receive various tips and fun facts about sustainable and healthy living. It will motivate you to change your daily habits even more!
• Virtual trees. Are you interested to learn more about your personal CO2 footprint? While walking with the free walking app #walk15, you will be growing virtual trees which will illustrate how much CO2 you save by choosing to walk instead of driving.

Start your walking challenge now! #walk15 is a free walking app that has already been used by hundreds of thousands of users worldwide. Also, more than 1000 companies globally have already used the app as a solution for engaging their teams to stay active and more sustainable. Research shows that #walk15 steps challenges allow engaging companies' teams 40% more than other motivational systems used before!

The app was chosen as an effective solution for motivating people to walk more and change their habits in a more sustainable way by the national institutions of the highest level, such as the Presidency of the Republic of Lithuania, public institutions, global companies, and organizations, such as Turkish Airlines Euroleague and 7Days EuroCup.

Walk15 integrates with the iOS Health application and allows you to receive the most accurate data.

Walk15 includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.

You can subscribe monthly or yearly and pay on the App Store, using your Apple ID. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renew may be turned off after purchase by going to the ‘Manage Subscription’ page in settings. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

By using this app, you agree to Walk15's Terms of Use (https://www.walk15.app/legal/walk15-app-terms-and-condition/) and Privacy Policy (https://www.walk15.app/legal/privacy-notice-walk15-app/).

Discover the AI-powered revolution in calorie tracking with WiseMeal!

No more tedious searching for individual food items. Just snap a photo, and instantly get all the calorie and nutrition details.

WiseMeal's core strengths lie in its accuracy, efficiency, and user-friendly experience design. We truly listen to our users' needs.

Here's how to use the core feature in 3 simple steps:
- Answer a few questions to create a personalized plan
- Take or upload a photo of any meal or food
- Get detailed nutrition information and easily track it

We've put a lot of thought into the user-friendly design, and we hope you enjoy it:
- We will identify every food item, including sauces
- You can add or delete specific food items or modify their weights
- If you don't have a picture, just search by text
- You can customize your own food list for future use
- You can plan meals for future dates
- Your budget will automatically adjust as your weight changes
- Your nutrition ratio will be based on your personal goals

We are working hard and are eager to hear more about your needs and suggestions.

WiseMeal is dedicated to providing a effective calorie tracking experience, helping you achieve your health and fitness goals with ease.

NOTE: We do not offer medical advice. Any and all recommendations should be viewed as suggestions, please consult with a professional and do your own research before trying a new calorie and nutrient plan.

Terms of Use:https://rc.wisemeal.org/web/h5template/6d3b8bc7-a490-4359-9bf4-863fb5f52154-language=en/dist/index.html

The brand new "HUAWEI Health: Europe" app has been launched to bring the "HUAWEI Health+" membership features to all users across Europe, such as "Workouts", "Yoga", "Mindful Meditation", and "Sleep Music".

Your go-to, integrated health and fitness companion. Whether you want to kick-start your fitness life, keep track of your health, or conveniently manage your smart wearable devices, the Huawei Health app has what you're looking for. Keep your data private, or share it with your loved ones, the power's yours. The latest in health and fitness technology, made simple, secure, and easy to use.

Keeps Up with Your Every Move
Keep track of your health journey. Huawei Health records your activity, supporting over 100 different sports, from beginner to advanced levels. See your workout data clearly every step of the way, so you can be sure you're reaching your goals. A wonderful world of fitness at the tip of your fingers.

Run How You Want
A simpler way to run that can benefit anyone. The app is able to record and map out your route as you're running, all while displaying key information so you can stay on target.

An Amazing Journey
Share your health journey with your friends and family. Your outdoor workout routes can be generated into videos with music for you to proudly share. Use Dynamic tracking to create videos to share on social media to inspire yourself and others with your fitness journey.

A New View on Health

The app is customised for each country's foods and brands.

Keep track of your food, exercise and weight, using the world's highest quality food and nutrition database and connect with a global community of people looking to make a change for the better and start losing weight and achieve your goals the healthy way. 

The app is available on Apple Watch and supports terrific Complications for your watch faces. 

The app is fully integrated with the Health app which lets you share your data with other Health connected apps. In particular you can:
- sync your Health app calories burned and steps in fatsecret

- sync your weight to the Health app

fatsecret is fast, simple to use and includes integration with external tools and services to help you succeed with your diet: 
- An easy to use food diary to plan and keep track of what you're eating.
- A wonderful community that's ready to provide support and turbo charge your weight loss.

- A barcode scanner and auto-complete functions.

- An exercise diary to record all the calories you burn.

- Notifications for support, comments and followers.
- Fantastic recipes and meal ideas.
- Sharing and interacting with your professional of choice.

The app syncs with fatsecret Professional, the most convenient way to share your food, exercise and weight with your preferred health professional. You can also sync your account online to access your info anywhere, any time.

Premium subscriptions are available for enhanced features to help you achieve your diet and weight management goals. Premium users get:
- Nutritional meal plans created by our dietitian specifically for different diet preferences and calorie goals (Keto Style, Balanced, Mediterranean, Intermittent Fasting, High Protein Low Carb)
- Advanced Meal Planning: plan ahead and know in advance how many calories each meal contains
- Custom Meal Headings: Six additional meal types that allow you to spread your food intake across multiple points in the day
- Water Tracking: so you can make sure you reach a daily water intake goal

If you choose to upgrade to fatsecret Premium, we offer a range of subscription options, including monthly, quarterly, or annually.

developer: The How We Feel Project, Inc.
description:
How We Feel is a free app created by scientists, designers, engineers, and therapists to help people better understand their emotions and find strategies to help them navigate their emotions in the moment. Conceived in conjunction with Yale University's Center for Emotional Intelligence and based on the work of Dr Marc Brackett, How We Feel helps people find the right word to describe how they feel while tracking their sleep, exercise, and health trends using HealthKit in order to spot patterns over time.

Founded as a science-based nonprofit, How We Feel is made possible by donations from people who are passionate about bringing mental wellbeing to the widest possible audience. Our data privacy terms are clear and easy-to-understand: all of your data is kept on your device unless you opt-in to send an anonymized version of your check-ins to be used in research to help more people.

Whether you are downloading this app in order to build better relationships, make your emotions to work for you, not against you, improve how you handle stress and anxiety or simply to feel better, How We Feel will help you identify patterns through daily HealthKit tracking and find emotional regulation strategies that will work for you. The How We Feel friends feature allows you to share how you feel with the people you trust most in real time, strengthening your most important relationships.

Filled with step-by-step video strategies you can do in as little as one minute on themes like "Change Your Thinking" to help you address negative thought patterns with cognitive strategies; "Move Your Body" to express and release emotions through movement strategies;"Be Mindful" to gain perspective and minimize the negative impact of misunderstood emotions with mindfulness strategies; "Reach Out" to build intimacy and trust, two important tools for emotional wellbeing, with social strategies.

Iepazīstieties ar Fitnesa Applikāciju – jūsu galveno fitnesa biedru, kas ir izstrādāts, lai pārveidotu jūsu treniņu rutīnu un palīdzētu sasniegt fitnesa mērķus. Šo lietotni, kas radīta un atzīta fitnesa speciālista Lauris Mičulis vadībā, kurš savu pieredzi un zināšanas ir krājis vairāk nekā 14 gadu garumā. Aplikāciju raksturo profesionāli izstrādātas treniņu programmas, augstas kvalitātes treniņu video un nenovērtējami treniņu padomi vienotā pieredzē. Neatkarīgi no tā, vai esat iesācējs vai pieredzējis sportists, mūsu lietotne piedāvā personalizētus rīkus un ieskatus, kas palīdzēs jūsu fitnesu pacelt jaunā līmenī.

Bez maksas iespējams iepazīties ar vienu treniņa programmu, vingrinājumu video un ikdienas motivāciju video

Abonētiem lietotājiem (via In App Purchase) pieejamas visas 14 gadu laikā izstrādās treniņu programmas, kas tiek regulāri pilnveidotas un papildinātas.
